resume.description: Currently a student at Life Choices Academy, to be a Fullstack Developer, the discipline, the drive, the overall good people in this academy is what made me stay for so long, i most definetly know more about coding in a month than what i learned at False Bay College

I really enjoyed my time at False Bay this is where I got my love for computers and coding in general. I made the decision to leave due to transportation. Although I was there for a short amount of time it taught me the one thing i wanted to pursue and thats coding
I matriculated at Strandfontein Secondary School in 2018. My subjects were Math Lit, Geography, Biography, Business Studies, English, Afrikaans, Life Orientation
